content:
Certainly! Here are some local shops and guides you can reach out to in Trøndelag for more information on fishing:

1. Trondhjems Turistforening: This is a popular tourist office and shop in Trondheim that can provide information on fishing in the region. They also offer guided fishing tours and equipment rentals. 2. Gaula Flyfishing Lodge: This is a lodge located near the Gaula River that specializes in fly fishing. They offer guided tours, equipment rentals, and other services. 3. Oppdal Fjellbete: This is a local shop in Oppdal that offers fishing equipment rentals and guided tours. They specialize in fly fishing and offer trips to a variety of locations in Trøndelag. 4. Fishspot Outdoor Adventures: This is a guide service that offers fishing tours in various locations around Trøndelag. They offer guided tours for salmon, trout, and other species, as well as equipment rentals and transportation. 5. Jakt- og Fiskespesialisten: This is a local fishing and hunting shop in Steinkjer that offers a variety of equipment for fishing and hunting. They can also provide local fishing advice and recommendations. I hope these recommendations are helpful and that you have a great time fishing in Trøndelag!
